programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey bartender (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) embarks on his first genuine relationship with a woman (Scarlett Johansson), but his constant craving for Internet porn threatens to bring things crashing down.

programme.desc: A woman suspected of murdering her lover with an ice pick ensnares a San Francisco cop in a web of lust and deceit.

programme.title: The Craft
programme.desc: Teen misfits befriend a suicidal newcomer and strike back at their tormentors with witchcraft in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder
programme.desc: A Vietnam POW (William Devane) comes home to Texas and soon, with his buddy (Tommy Lee Jones), must avenge his slain family.

programme.title: When Worlds Collide
programme.desc: A pilot (Richard Derr), his girlfriend (Barbara Rush) and lottery winners escape by rocket to another planet before a star hits Earth.

programme.title: Under the Gun
programme.desc: Firsthand accounts from parents of Sandy Hook victims, expert commentary and statistics reveal the state of American gun violence and gun control laws.

programme.title: Under the Gun
programme.desc: Firsthand accounts from parents of Sandy Hook victims, expert commentary and statistics reveal the state of American gun violence and gun control laws.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: With a game, an Italian Jew (Roberto Benigni) shields his son (Giorgio Cantarini) from Nazi horrors in a concentration camp during World War II.

programme.title: The Madness of King George
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: The Rage: Carrie 2
programme.desc: After her best friend commits suicide, an unpopular girl (Emily Bergl) discovers she has telekinetic powers and uses them to seek revenge on her humiliators.

programme.title: Flight of the Intruder
programme.desc: Two Navy pilots (Willem Dafoe, Brad Johnson) hatch a rogue mission to bomb Hanoi with a special low-altitude plane.

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: An American major (Jean-Claude Van Damme) flies to Hong Kong for an outlawed martial-arts contest called the Kumite.

programme.title: Blow Out
programme.desc: A sound man (John Travolta) re-creates a political murder-by-car-crash with a sight-and-sound montage.

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Two FBI agents face racism while investigating the disappearance of three civil rights activists in 1964 Mississippi.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher (Tom Cruise) goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Intent on drinking himself to death, a man (Nicolas Cage) who has lost everything finds solace with a Las Vegas hooker (Elisabeth Shue).

programme.title: Runaway Train
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Jon Voight, Eric Roberts) and a stowaway girl (Rebecca De Mornay) ride an unmanned diesel speeding out of control through Alaska.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Two professional divers (Chris Carmack, Laura Vandervoort) fight for their lives when they encounter criminals in Hawaiian waters.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Passengers and crew (Kevin Hart, Method Man) enjoy a wild party aboard an airliner flying from Los Angeles to New York.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Passengers and crew (Kevin Hart, Method Man) enjoy a wild party aboard an airliner flying from Los Angeles to New York.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill
programme.desc: A marshal's (Kirk Douglas) wife is killed by his best friend's (Anthony Quinn) son, whom he must bring to justice.

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in From the Cold
programme.desc: A British agent in the twilight of his career is sent to East Germany as an unwitting pawn in a high-level plot.

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel
programme.desc: When their mother descends into madness, siblings Gretel and Hansel must fend for themselves in the dark and unforgiving woods. Stumbling upon an isolated home, the children soon suspect that the generous but mysterious owner has sinister intentions.

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: The violent nature of prizefighter Jake LaMotta (Robert De Niro) leads first to a boxing championship, then to a downward spiral of self-destruction.

programme.title: The Fire Inside
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to create revolutionary music that changes the world.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: A pimp (Terrence Howard) in Memphis, Tenn., sees rap music as the way to escape his dead-end existence and achieve something meaningful.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage rock journalist gets his big break when he follows an up-and-coming band on its tour.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: Fired from his group and desperate for money, a guitarist (Jack Black) poses as a teacher for students who play in a school band.

programme.title: Better Man
programme.desc: The true story of the meteoric rise, dramatic fall, and remarkable resurgence of British pop superstar Robbie Williams.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A daredevil aviator (Jude Law) and an ace reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) fight an evil mastermind and his army of gigantic robots.

programme.title: Mansfield Park
programme.desc: Sent to live with relatives by her impoverished parents, a girl grows up, becomes a writer and falls in love.

programme.title: Cinma
programme.desc: Jeanne uses her charms and intelligence to climb the social ladder. Against all convention, she becomes one of the favorites of King Louis XV and moves to Versailles.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Writer J.M. Barrie (Johnny Depp) befriends a widow (Kate Winslet) and her four sons who inspire him to create the character Peter Pan.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: I.Q.
programme.desc: Albert Einstein (Walter Matthau) plays matchmaker for his egghead niece (Meg Ryan) and an unschooled auto mechanic (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Sheryl Crow rises to superstardom and finds a way to turn even her darkest experiences into captivating, timeless work -- creating a legacy that continues to inspire and influence generations.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realize they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a man's new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Wild Eyed and Wicked
programme.desc: A woman tries to strike back at the medieval creature that's haunted her family for generations. To do so, she must learn how to draw upon a time of steel and blade when armor-clad knights rode out and dueled monsters to the death.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Sheryl Crow rises to superstardom and finds a way to turn even her darkest experiences into captivating, timeless work -- creating a legacy that continues to inspire and influence generations.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Together Together
programme.desc: A young loner becomes a surrogate mother for a single, middle-aged man who wants a child. Their unexpected relationship soon challenges their perceptions of connection, boundaries and the particulars of love.

programme.title: Becoming Jane
programme.desc: Though her parents expect her to marry a wealthy suitor, young Jane Austen (Anne Hathaway) becomes involved with a penniless lawyer (James McAvoy) who inspires her future writings.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: A young princess (Audrey Hepburn), tired of her constraints, runs off with a U.S. newsman (Gregory Peck) in Rome.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: A Las Vegas mystery man (Robert Redford) offers a desperate couple (Demi Moore, Woody Harrelson) $1 million for a night with the wife.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: Following the career of singer Sinad O'Connor through her rise to fame and how her iconoclastic personality led to her exile from the pop mainstream.

programme.title: Twisted
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danica's picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: A young woman (Liv Tyler) changes the life of a single father (Ben Affleck) who used to be a successful New York music publicist.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: The parents of a young man (Matthew McConaughey) who still lives at home hire a beautiful woman (Sarah Jessica Parker) to entice him to finally leave the nest.

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Two bullets force a career-driven Manhattan lawyer (Harrison Ford) to start life over with his loving wife (Annette Bening) and daughter.

programme.title: Naruto: Voltando Realidade
programme.desc: Tsunade acredita que h uma conexo entre Menma e a Aldeia Escondida do Som. Naruto e os outros vo para o Pas dos Arrozais para dar uma olhada nas memrias de Menma.

programme.title: Naruto: Um Passado A Ser Apagado

programme.title: Naruto: Shukaku O Alvo

programme.desc: Gaara e Naruto encurralam Hoko, o ltimo dos quatro celestiais, num vale. Eles descobrem que o objetivo deles era roubar o chacra de Shukaku, o Esprito da Areia, e assim ter o poder para desafiar as Cinco Grandes Naes.

programme.title: Naruto: A Partida
programme.desc: Gaara se transforma em Shukaku, o Esprito da Areia, e obtm uma vitria impressionante. Depois da batalha, alguns descobrem novos caminhos para seguir, e Naruto decide ser ainda mais forte ao ir numa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya.

programme.title: Naruto: Naruto Uzumaki Chegando!
programme.desc: Bem-vindo Aldeia Oculta da folha, onde ninjas assassinos percorrem a terra, e o travesso Naruto Uzumaki apronta encrenca aonde for. Ao roubar o antigo pergaminho do selo, ele libera um poder nico raramente visto em um garoto de 12 anos!

programme.title: Naruto: Meu Nome Konohamaru
programme.desc: Naruto finalmente se forma na Academia Ninja e diz que sabe tudo. Bom, pelo menos isso que ele conta para Konohamaru, o neto tampinha do lder da aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto: Sasuke E Sakura, Amigos Ou Inimigos
programme.desc: Para se tornar um ninja, Naruto precisa formar uma equipe com seus colegas, a bela Sakura e o srio Sasuke, que tm uma coisa em comum: o dio que sentem por Naruto. Ento, Naruto tenta conquistar Sakura fingindo ser a paixo da vida dela... Sasuke!

programme.title: Naruto: Voc Falhou A Deciso Finalde Kakashi

programme.sub-title: Voc Falhou A Deciso Finalde Kakashi

programme.title: Naruto: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas
programme.desc: Naruto e sua equipe comeam suas primeiras misses de ninja cumprindo tarefas entediantes e bsicas. Cansado e com fome, Naruto desabafa com o Hokage que, entretido, prope uma nova misso: proteger um velho rabugento chamado Tazuna at a casa dele!
programme.sub-title: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas

programme.title: Naruto: O Juramento De Dor
programme.desc: Kakashi est em vantagem na batalha contra Zabuza, mas a situao se reverte quando Kakashi preso na Priso de gua de Zabuza! Kakashi insisite para que a equipe fuja, mas Naruto lembra da promessa que fez de nunca mais fugir e decide ficar!!

programme.title: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan

programme.title: Naruto: A Floresta do Chakra

programme.title: Naruto: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu

programme.title: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado

programme.title: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida

programme.desc: Flora uma elefanta circense que no consegue mais executar seus truques e vai ser sacrificada. Na noite anterior data da eutansia, a filha do proprietrio do circo a salva. Juntas, elas enfrentam desafios para chegar reserva animal.

programme.title: Ma Ma
programme.desc: Aps ser diagnosticada com cncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grvida. Alm de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera.

programme.title: Grand Central
programme.desc: Gary consegue um emprego como subcontratado de descontaminao em uma usina nuclear em Rhone, sem saber que a contaminao por radiao um perigo dirio. Ao mesmo tempo, inicia um caso ilcito com Karole, a noiva do seu chefe.

programme.title: Vale dos Deuses
programme.desc: A abundncia contrasta com a pobreza em trs narrativas separadas, apresentando um escritor de classe mdia, um trilionrio excntrico e uma comunidade Navajo em dificuldades.

programme.title: Um Homem Comum
programme.desc: Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que h uma recompensa milionria para quem souber onde o fugitivo est.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Aps ter assaltado um banco, um motorista capturado com o dinheiro na fronteira dos Estados Unidos com o Mxico. Mandado para uma priso local, ele conta com a ajuda de um menino de dez anos de idade para planejar sua fuga.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.desc: Agora a hora do destino! Yugi vs. Atem! Se Yugi derrotar Atem, Yugi prova que est pronto para ficar sozinho, e Atem pode ir ficar com seus amigos no mundo do alm... mas Yugi e Atem se separaro para sempre!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.desc: Atem invocou todos os trs deuses egpcios! Que chance Yugi tem contra essas criaturas poderosas que ningum foi capaz de derrotar? melhor que Yugi bole logo uma estratgia, ou esse duelo acabar rpido!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.desc: Atem no s ainda tem todas as trs Cartas de Deuses Egpcios, mas Yugi tambm no tem um nico monstro em campo!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR
programme.desc: Yugi e Atem mais que amigos, mais prximos que irmos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Fubuki oficialmente parte do Raimon Eleven. Mostrando a seus colegas de equipe uma nova maneira de praticar, talvez Fubuki possa traz-los para um novo nvel e reunir a equipe.
programme.sub-title: Quem o novo atacante do Ace

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon subiu de nvel durante o treinamento de snowboard e est pronto para enfrentar a Aliea Academy mais uma vez. Mas eles tm o que preciso para venc-los? E mesmo se o fizerem, o que mais a Aliea Academy tem reservado.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Quando todos pensavam que a Terra havia sido salva, a Academia Aliea atacou mais uma vez, desta vez com Epsilon. Essas caras realmente querem dizer negcios e vo bater em Manyuuji em Kyto.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Aps a derrota esmagadora do Manyuuji Junior High, Raimon se prepara para enfrent-los, com Kogure Yuuya ajudando no pedido de Otonashi Haruna. Os resultados so estranhos e desanimadores, mas tambm encorajadores.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon tem um novo membro, Kogure, que faz brincadeiras com eles o tempo todo. Ainda assim, eles precisaro de toda a ajuda possvel.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon est preso no meio de um jogo contra a True Teikoku Academy, e Kageyama convenceu seus jogadores a usarem todos os meios para vencer; mesmo que isso signifique a destruio de suas mentes e corpos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon finalmente chega em casa para recarregar as baterias e treinar muito mais. Eles descobrem que todo mundo est treinando para ajud-los, incluindo alguns antigos oponentes.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Assim que chegam em casa, e Raimon esto de volta estrada novamente - desta vez eles esto indo para akasaka, onde h rumores de que a Aliea Academy tem uma base.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon acha que o centro de treinamento secreto do CCC sob o parque de diverses um timo lugar para se treinar, mas de onde veio.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O grande jogo contra Epsilon est aqui, e Raimon sai com toda a fora! Eles sero capazes de lutar contra os aliengenas.
programme.sub-title: Epsilon A batalha mais difcil ainda

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Notcias inesperadas sobre outro caderno de Daisuke envia Raimon para Fukuoka, onde eles encontram um dos velhos amigos de Daisuke e algum que pode se tornar o aprendiz de Endou.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O jogo de exibio entre Raimon e Yokato Junior High um caso difcil. Endou e Tachimukai esto exibindo seus goleiros.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Hiroto, que na verdade Gran, capito do The Genesis - desafia Raimon para um jogo. Ele rapidamente se transforma em uma partida unilateral, j que o Genesis continua marcando e nenhum dos Raimon Eleven consegue acompanhar seus movimentos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A deciso de Kazemaru de deixar o time deixou Endou arrasado e tirou sua vontade de praticar. Nada que algum diga parece ter um efeito nele.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: As notcias sobre a existncia de um atacante de chamas mandam Raimon para Okinawa, esperando que seja Gouenji Shuuya. Mas que coisas inesperadas podem acontecer ao longo do caminho.
programme.sub-title: A grande batalha no mar do sul

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Logo aps chegar a Okinawa, Raimon inicia a busca pelo atacante. Enquanto procuram, Fubuki e Domon encontram um jogador que afirma ser o atacante.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tsunami revela a Raimon que ele se juntou ao clube de futebol da escola e eles querem brincar com eles. Raimon vai para o Oumihara Junior High, e o jogo comea.
programme.sub-title: O jogo de futebol rtmico radical

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O jogo entre Raimon e Oumihara continua, sem nenhuma das equipes se afastando. No final, Raimon vence, mas uma vitria estreita.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Epsilon se tornou o Epsilon Remastered e desafia Raimon para a batalha. Mas no so apenas eles que esto nivelados, Raimon tambm. Mas eles ainda no conseguem romper as tcnicas de Desarm, nem mesmo Fubuki.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A partida entre Raimon e Epsilon Remastered continua sua segunda metade. Embora eles tentem o seu melhor, Desarm muito rpido e poderoso para eles.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O retorno de Gouenji, juntamente com a vitria contra o Epsilon Remastered, elevaram o esprito de Raimon. Eles decidem voltar para casa para descansar. Mas assim que eles voltam, Diamond Dust quer que Raimon os enfrente em um jogo.
programme.sub-title: A escurido congelante da poeira de diamante

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Algum inesperado est aqui para se juntar a Raimon no meio da partida - Aphrodi! O rival de Raimon veio se juntar e lutar ao lado deles.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tcnico Hitomiko decide remover Endou como goleiro e pede que ele se torne um libero. Depois disso, Aphrodi se tornar um atacante e Tachimukai se tornar o novo goleiro de Raimon.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven chega a Teikoku para treinamento, conforme solicitado por Kidou. Kidou tambm pede que seus ex-colegas de equipe - o time Teikoku jogue um amistoso contra o Raimon com Endou, Kidou e Domon do lado de Teikoku.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Prominence e Diamond Dust se combinaram para se tornar a equipe mais forte do universo - The Chaos - e desafiam Raimon para um jogo. Este o primeiro jogo que Raimon joga em sua nova formao.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Graas a Otomura, Kidou descobre como parar o ritmo do Caos. O fluxo do jogo totalmente revertido, pois Raimon continua marcando sem parar.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon exige que o treinador Hitomiko explique por que Gran a chamou de irm, entre outras coisas. Ela promete explicar tudo depois que eles chegarem ao Monte Fuji.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Quando Raimon entra na Academia Aliea, sua verdade chocante revelada: a Academia Aliea so crianas humanas cujas habilidades foram aprimoradas pelo meteorito Aliea.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A primeira metade da partida de Raimon contra o The Genesis comeou. No entanto, ainda h mais um problema na equipe, e esse problema s pode ser respondido pela pessoa com um problema, Fubuki Shirou.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Genesis rompeu com o evoludo Mugen The Hand, e assume a liderana mais uma vez. Irritado com a observao de Seijirou de que Raimon o mesmo que Gnesis, Endou tenta furiosamente provar que ele est errado.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon finalmente derrotou Gnesis e abre os olhos de Seijirou. Mas, no final, qual foi a verdadeira razo pela qual a Aliea Academy comeou.
programme.sub-title: O Raimon vs. Raimon se enfrentam

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven retorna Raimon Junior High apenas para encontrar Ryichi Kenzaki esperando por eles l, junto com os antigos membros de Raimon que deixaram a equipe devido a ferimentos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Mesmo tendo perdido 2 pontos no primeiro tempo, Raimon nunca desiste e recupera 2 pontos no segundo tempo. No entanto, as coisas pioram quando os Imperadores das Trevas comeam a atacar violentamente.
programme.sub-title: A equipe mais forte do mundo verso da Blizzard

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A longa luta de Raimon contra a Aliea Academy finalmente acabou, e todos esto preparados para ir para casa.
programme.sub-title: A equipe mais forte do mundo Verso Fire

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Genji conta a Endou e Fubuki sobre o momento em que ele deixou Raimon, ento eles se lembram de suas inmeras batalhas contra a Aliea Academy, treinando, encontrando novos amigos e inimigos.
programme.sub-title: O Encontro De quem o Representante Japons

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Influenciado por Ishisaki, Hyuga tenta marcar Wakabayashi sem sucesso. Sawada mostra a ele o motivo, e o estilo de jogo dos Meiwa muda radicalmente.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Agora que o time dos Meiwa voltou vida, Hyuga empata com a ajuda de Takeshi Sawada e, minutos antes de acabar o jogo, marca vantagem.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Na prorrogao, os dois times esto esgotados. A defesa decidir a partida com um duelo entre os goleiros Nankaatsu Wakabayashi e Meiwa Wakashimazu.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: A final do torneio nacional est prestes a terminar. O plano de Wakabayashi de se defender para deixar Tsubasa e Misaki descansarem valeu a pena.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu o campeo do torneio nacional, e seu capito, Tsubasa Ozora, levanta a bandeira com orgulho e alegria como sinal de vitria.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Shun Nitta, ex-jogador do time de Nankatsu, desafia Tsubasa. Nitta impressiona Tsubasa com sua agilidade e o pressiona com seu famoso chute de falco.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nas finais, o time de Otomo mantm a escola de Nankatsu afastada com seu novo jogador Shun Nitta, mas ele percebe que no pode derrotar Tsubasa.
programme.sub-title: A caminho do grande torneio. O tiro do falco

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Shun Nitta no consegue concluir seu chute de falco sem que a bola bata no cho. Depois de vrias tentativas, finalmente aperfeioa seu chute.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Toho enfrenta o Musashi. Hyuga marca trs gols, forando Misugi a comparecer na quadra antes do previsto. Misugi tem apenas 30 minutos para reagir.
programme.sub-title: Spella r Atsuba, Hyuga vs Too Much

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Ainda estamos na final das eliminatrias em Tquio, e o capito de Musashi usa toda a sua fora para empatar, apesar do problema no corao.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa recebe uma mensagem de um amigo, Genzo Wakabayashi. Tsubasa pergunta o motivo da ligao e diz que encontrou um jogador mais forte que ele.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Aps um pesado treinamento na ilha de Okinawa, Hyuga se livra de sua compaixo, mas quando volta para seus companheiros, se depara com novo obstculo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu empata o placar no segundo tempo graas a Takasugi. Tsubasa marcar mais um gol, ou ser que Azumaichi conseguir domar Nankatsu?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: A partida entre Nankatsu e Hanawa comea e Tsubasa enfrenta os irmos Tachibana, que agora mostraro um novo chute especial para derrotar Nankatsu.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa ferido tentando defender o gol. Os irmos Tachibana aproveitam e marcam o gol do empate. Tsubasa poder retornar antes do final da partida?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Faltam alguns minutos para o fim, e o time de Nankatsu no consegue se aproximar da pequena rea. Os irmos Tachibana tentaro uma nova estratgia.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Estamos nas quartas de final do torneio nacional: Furano contra Minami-iwa. Matsuyama e seu time no conseguem neutralizar o ataque dos oponentes.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu joga contra Hirado. O vencedor avanar para as semifinais. Tsubasa deve enfrentar o poderoso Hiroshi Jito, capito e zagueiro do time.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Depois de uma desvantagem esmagadora, proporcionada pela dupla Hirado, Tsubasa decide arriscar e tenta dar o famoso chute com o efeito de Roberto.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nas semifinais, o primeiro a jogar o Meiwa contra Toho. Sem Hyuga na quadra, Meiwa tira vantagem de Toho, enquanto Hyuga assite o jogo do banco.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: No ltimo jogo das semifinais, Nankatsu enfrenta Furano e seu capito, Hikaru Matsuyama, vestindo o nmero dez como Tsubasa. Quem ir para a final?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Furano empata na segunda metade da partida. Os ferimentos de Tsubasa esto piorando, mas ele tenta chutar mais uma vez. Matsuyama tenta impedi-lo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Na final do torneio, Tsubasa espera se recuperar de sua leso para jogar contra Toho. Hyuga decide pedir ao treinador Kitazune que o deixe jogar.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Estamos nos primeiros cinco minutos do jogo entre Nankatsu e Toho, e a tenso na quadra pode ser cortada com uma faca.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Apesar da disciplina de Nankatsu, Toho domina com dois gols de diferena graas ao seu capito, Kojiro Hyuga, e ao seu poderoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Apesar da recomendao mdica, Tsubasa quer continuar na quadra. Ishizaki e os outros tentam defender o gol. Hyuga usa seu famoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu e Toho tm trs gols cada. No calor da partida, Takasugi de Nankatsu comete uma falta, dando a Hyuga um chute livre. Ele marcar um gol?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Se empatarem na prorrogao, os dois times sero campees, mas Tsubasa e Hyuga no querem dividir o ttulo. Este o ltimo jogo de Tsubasa no Japo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Hyuga e Tsubasa esto mostrando seu talento, e os chutes so dignos desta final. Todos sabem que, no fundo, um duelo pessoal. Quem ser o campeo?

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: Com o fim do grande campeonato, uma partida entre incrveis estudantes colegiais se aproxima!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: A viagem do time para a Europa anunciada! Hyuga o capito, mas Tsubasa est determinado a jogar.
programme.sub-title: Boas Vindas A Um Velho Rival

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: No treino entre o time do Japo e o Hamburgo, Wakabayashi exibe sua defesa de ferro. Schneider emprega um ataque devastador e torna impossvel que marquem um gol. Enquanto isso Hyuga est furioso. E ento vem Tsubasa

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: O amistoso contra o Hamburgo foi desastroso para o Japo, e eles retomam seu planejamento. O capito Matsuyama busca a confiana dos outros, enquanto Hyuga tenta superar Schneider. Enquanto isso, Wakabayashi faz um anncio surpreendente.

programme.title: Operao Perigosa
programme.desc: Depois que uma transao de drogas no d certo, dois traficantes nova-iorquinos se deslocam para Miami, onde estabelecem uma operao de fraude de crdito lucrativo.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Um ex-jogador problemtico da Major League Baseball volta para casa para confrontar seu padrasto abusivo.

programme.title: Jogo sujo
programme.desc: Aps assaltar um cassino de Las Vegas, apenas um dos cinco integrantes de uma gangue consegue escapar. O fugitivo decide apagar qualquer memria do seu passado e se torna um xerife. Dez anos depois, os outros quatro ladres rastreiam o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Kite - Anjo da Vingana
programme.desc: Sawa perde o pai policial e a me, vtimas de um macabro duplo homicdio. Com a ajuda do parceirode seu pai, Karl Aker, e uma misteriosa amiga de seu passado Sawa comea uma perseguio implacvel em busca de quem os matou.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado aps seis anos preso por um crime que no cometeu, Shane Danielsno demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a mfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilncia constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve peg-los antes que eles o peguem.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Vingana Implacvel
programme.desc: Um agente da Interpol atribudo a uma fora-tarefa para combater o trfico de armas e drogas na regio dos Blcs. Quando um membro da fora-tarefa morto ele lidera a equipe em uma aventura cheia de ao enquanto vinga a morte de seu amigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Do Jinchurik!

programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro

programme.title: In Harm's Way

programme.title: Defiance

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers

programme.title: Gladiator

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: The Reading
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.desc: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company.

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction
programme.desc: A new investigator steps forward, Near, a central figure in the SPK, an organization that is trying to catch Kira without relying on L.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Robin's cola care package helps spring her friends from an icy prison, and Luffy's bold words inspire a battered and beaten pirate to keep fighting!
programme.sub-title: Mansion of Great Chaos! The Enraged Don and the Captured Crew!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy continues his battle with the magnetic twins, Chopper uses a rumble ball in his battle with a hockey player and Robin tries to recover the Straw Hat flag!
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Phoenix! The Dream of the Pirate Flag Sworn to a Friend!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy battles an opponent who's too hot to handle, Robin gets attacked by a jungle, and Chopper makes a heroic dash for the Straw Hat flag!
programme.sub-title: The Red Hot Decisive Battle! Luffy vs. The Scorching Don!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's red-hot battle with Papa threatens to destroy the entire icy island, and the rest of the Straw Hats need a little help from a former enemy to recover their flag!
programme.sub-title: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Brave Pirates!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The most adorable hero the world has ever known Chopperman must battle a hideously evil villain to regain control of his favorite television station!
programme.sub-title: Chopperman to the Rescue! Protect the TV Station by the Shore!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While sailing through haunted waters, the Straw Hats encounter a ghost ship that's home to a walking, talking skeleton!
programme.sub-title: THE MYSTERIOUS SKELETON FLOATING THROUGH THE FOG! VENTURE INTO THE DEVIL'S SEA!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats attempt to unravel the mystery of their new comrade, but the skeleton's sad story is interrupted by a ghastly landing at the haunted island of Thriller Bark!
programme.sub-title: THE JOY OF SEEING PEOPLE! THE GENTLEMAN SKELETON'S TRUE IDENTITY!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!
programme.sub-title: ONE UNNATURAL PHENOMENON AFTER THE NEXT! DISEMBARKING ON THRILLER BARK!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper, Nami, and Usopp get scared out of their minds when they encounter a graveyard full of zombies! Meanwhile, the rest of the crew gets trapped in super creepy sea web!
programme.sub-title: THE MAN CALLED A GENIUS! HOGBACK MAKES HIS APPEARANCE!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: An invisible man turns Nami's bath time into a harrowing experience, and Usopp battles a hall full of haunted paintings with a handful of burning candles!
programme.sub-title: NAMI'S IN A MAJOR PINCH! THE ZOMBIE MANSION AND THE INVISIBLE MAN

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Usopp, Nami, and Chopper seek to unravel the secrets of the haunted mansion, Luffy and the gang do battle with an army of the undead!
programme.sub-title: THE ZOMBIE'S SECRET! HOGBACK'S NIGHTMARISH LABORATORY

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy sets his sights on the shadowing-stealing monster known as Gecko Moria, and the zombie army prepares for a night attack led by their perverted, invisible leader!
programme.sub-title: HIS NAME IS MORIA! THE GREAT SHADOW-SEIZING PIRATE'S TRAP

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp, Chopper, and Nami get trapped in a coffin after being slashed by a zombie samurai. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats make short work of some haunted paintings!
programme.sub-title: FEAST OF THE ZOMBIE SONG! THE NIGHT HUNT'S BELL IS THE SOUND OF DARKNESS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After escaping from their coffin prison, Usopp, Chopper, and Nami do battle with a garden full of adorably dead zombie animals!
programme.sub-title: A BUNCH OF ANIMALS? PERONA'S WONDER GARDEN

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: An undead warthog sets her sights on Nami, Zorro and Sanji vanish without a trace, Franky and Robin battle an unbeatable army, and Luffy gets captured!
programme.sub-title: THE VANISHING STRAW HAT CREW! A MYSTERIOUS SWORDSMAN APPEARS!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge!
programme.sub-title: CHIVALRY REMAINS! THE TRAITOROUS ZOMBIE PROTECTS NAMI

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!
programme.sub-title: APPEARING FROM THE SKY! THAT MAN IS THE HUMMING SWORDSMAN!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria's devious plan is revealed, and Luffy's escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can't live without!
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S EMERGENCY SITUATION! THE ULTIMATE SHADOW'S DESTINATION!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook tells Franky and Robin the secret to slaying zombies, and Gecko Moria reveals the terrifying monster that will be the recipient of Luffy's shadow!
programme.sub-title: THE WARRIOR KNOWN AS THE "DEVIL"!! THE MOMENT OF OARS' REVIVAL

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!
programme.sub-title: AWAKENING AFTER 500 YEARS!! OARS OPENS HIS EYES!!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Gecko Moria's minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy's shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro!
programme.sub-title: A BELIEF WORTH BEGGING TO LIVE FOR!! BROOK DEFENDS HIS AFRO

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook's story about a promise he made to a very special whale!
programme.sub-title: A MAN'S PROMISE NEVER DIES!! TO THE FRIEND WAITING UNDER THE DISTANT SKY

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook's battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love!
programme.sub-title: I SWEAR TO GO SEE HIM!! BROOK AND THE CAPE OF PROMISE

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!
programme.sub-title: FOOD, NAMI AND SHADOWS!! LUFFY'S ENRAGED COUNTERATTACK

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp's naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona's depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback!
programme.sub-title: USOPP'S THE STRONGEST? LEAVE ANYTHING NEGATIVE TO HIM

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding!
programme.sub-title: THE GENERAL ZOMBIES ARE DOWN IN A FLASH!! OARS FEELS LIKE AN ADVENTURE!!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami's beastly abductor!
programme.sub-title: BLAZING KNIGHT SANJI!! KICK DOWN THE FAKE WEDDING

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
programme.sub-title: A CLEAR-CLEAR HISTORY? SANJI'S STOLEN DREAM

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
programme.sub-title: SAVE ME, HERO!! MY ENEMY IS THE IMMORTAL PRINCESS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can't lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
programme.sub-title: PERONA IS TERRIFIED!! USOPP AND UNTRUTHFUL SHARE THE SAME "U"

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before!
programme.sub-title: SLASHES DANCING ON THE ROOFTOP!! SHOWDOWN: ZORO VS. RYUMA

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback's evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who's wearing his shadow!
programme.sub-title: CHOPPER IS FURIOUS!! HOGBACK'S EVIL MEDICAL PRACTICES

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!
programme.sub-title: OARS ROARS! COME OUT, STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: A man from another world crash lands on Earth during the age of the Vikings.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Alan Arkin and Jude Law star in this engrossing sci-fi thriller about an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: In a stunning dual role, international action star Jet Li portrays Gabriel Yulaw, a police officer confronted with a sinister form of himself escaped from an advanced, parallel universe and intent on killing Gabriel.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Born in the flames of hell and brought to Earth, Hellboy was rescued from sinister forces by the benevolent Dr. Broom, who raised him to be a hero. Hellboy stands as the key line of defense against an evil madman who seeks to destroy mankind.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a space-age courier who's plugged in, turned on and buffed up to deliver the most important data of the 21st century, wet-wired directly into his brain! A rapid-fire roller coaster of action and high-impact imagery! Rating: R

programme.title: Vera Cruz
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: The Legend Of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger of an ambush arranged by the outlaw leader Butch Cavandish returns to fight back as a great masked western hero - The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Vera Cruz
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: Bounce
programme.desc: Buddy (Ben Affleck) is a smooth-talking ad executive enjoying a high-powered career. When a sudden twist of fate changes everything, it leads him into a head-over-heels in love affair with a recently widowed woman named Abby (Gwyneth Paltrow).

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: After arriving at New York's JFK airport, Viktor Navorski gets unwittingly caught in bureaucratic glitches that make it impossible for him to return to his home country or enter the U.S.

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: Bounce
programme.desc: Buddy (Ben Affleck) is a smooth-talking ad executive enjoying a high-powered career. When a sudden twist of fate changes everything, it leads him into a head-over-heels in love affair with a recently widowed woman named Abby (Gwyneth Paltrow).

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: In this comedy, Kirk, an average guy, cant believe his luck when the successful and gorgeous babe Molly falls for him. His smart-ass friends, his crazy family, and even his obnoxious ex-girlfriend are just as shocked as he is.

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Bekinsale) meet unexpectedly, but part ways, determining that fate will guide their future if they're meant to be together.

programme.title: Elizabethtown

programme.title: Vinganca Implacavel
programme.desc: Agente da Interpol designado para fora-tarefa nos Blcs, enquanto investiga um traficante de armas russo.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixo s crianas e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele no tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: Quando um furaco estranho inunda Los Angeles, milhares de tubares aterrorizam a populao alagada, e o assassino mais mortal da natureza domina o mar, a terra e o ar.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal
programme.desc: Manji v sua irm mais nova ser assassinada na sua frente e comea sua vingana. Uma mulher misteriosa aparecer diante de Manji, concedendo-lhe juventude eterna e imortalidade. Em seguida, os pais de Rin Asano so mortos por um grupo de espadachins chamado Itto ruy, e o estdio de esgrima de seus pais destrudo. Para se vingar, ela pedir ajuda a Manji, e os dois lutaro contra os Itto ruy.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Aos 16 anos de idade, Max McGrath descobre que seu corpo pode gerar a energia mais poderosa do universo, ele deve vincular-se com o nico ser capaz de conten-lo: um extraterrestre tecno-orgnico misterioso chamado Steel. Unidos como o super-heri Max Steel, os dois amigos devem combater uma ameaa aliengena e desvendar os segredos de seu passado.

programme.title: Clculo Mortal
programme.desc: Niko e Tillie so dois adolescentes que engatam um romance de vero. Tudo vai bem at que o irmo do garoto aparece em cena. programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 5 Cabeas
programme.desc: Um monstruoso tubaro de cinco cabeas espalha o terror no oceano aberto antes de invadir as praias de Porto Rico, colocando em perigo a outrora pacfica ilha paradisaca. Enquanto a criatura devora tudo em seu caminho, inclusive humanos, a polcia e a equipe do aqurio se mobilizam para impedir a carnificina e salvar vidas.

programme.title: O Anel do Rei - A ltima Batalha
programme.desc: Baseado em uma lenda do seculo 13 e estrelado por Edwin Endre (da serie Vikings) e James Bloor (Dunkirk), o filme conta uma historia repleta de acao epica de um jovem rei que deve aceitar sua responsabilidade e ganhar a confianca do seu povo, a fim de defender a sua liberdade contra as cruzadas violentas.

programme.title: Espio Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do servio secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem soluo h quarenta anos.

programme.title: Onde Esta Deus?
programme.desc: Baseado em Romanos 8:28, inspirado por eventos verdadeiros que a vida pode lanar a uma famlia.

programme.title: Cartas para Deus
programme.desc: Um menino lutando contra o cncer escreve cartas para Deus, inspirando esperana entre todos.

programme.title: Eu Acredito
programme.desc: Um menino de 9 anos experimenta o poder de Deus de uma forma sobrenatural.

programme.title: Meus Vizinhos Aliengenas
programme.desc: Quando um astronauta mundialmente famoso volta para casa aps sua ltima misso, ele traz uma lembrana nica para sua esposa e dois filhos: um pedao de um asteride que caiu em sua estao espacial.

programme.title: A ltima Pea
programme.desc: Paula Stephnia organiza uma festa surpresa para o irmo e, quando est terminando de decorar a casa com muitos dinossauros, descobre que faltava uma pea em um dos brinquedos. Para recuper-lo, Paula ter que enfrentar o malvado dono de uma loja de brinquedos, vivendo um dia de grandes desafios e aventuras. Ser que ela conseguir terminar a decorao a tempo?

programme.title: O Pequeno Bulldog
programme.desc: A amante dos animais, Amber, deseja desesperadamente um cachorro. Quando ela se apaixona por Shadow, ela enfrenta sua famlia e a prefeitura para lutar por seu novo melhor amigo em uma corrida contra o relgio.

programme.title: Espio Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do servio secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem soluo h quarenta anos.
